meanings.sent2: The untranslatable emotions in the song moved me deeply.
meanings.sent3: Trying to explain the taste of the unique fruit was untranslatable.
meanings.sent4: Her smile held an untranslatable warmth that lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The untranslatable colors of the sunset painted the sky in hues I had never seen before.

meanings.definition: Impossible to express in another language.
meanings.sent1: The subtle nuances of the language were untranslatable.
meanings.sent2: The untranslatable cultural references made the book challenging to translate.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at a joke in the foreign language came out untranslatable.
meanings.sent4: The untranslatable feeling of nostalgia washed over her as she read the old letter.
meanings.sent5: The untranslatable melody of the traditional song resonated with the audience.
